review: After playing this game for 2000+ hours before, I sadly cannot recommend this game after what they did to Overwatch 2. Overwatch 1 was fantastic, this on the other hand feels like a cash grab. Balance is getting worse and worse, the for years promised PVE mode with Talent trees etc got scrapped (or rather they now sell an inferior version of it in small packages, thus make more money out of it than if they would have sold it all in one). You even have to unlock new heroes now on the Battlepass. This makes no sense in a game where you're supposed to change heroes to counter the enemy.

Overwatch 2 es como un ex, te hace muchas promesas de que va a cambiar y tu aun sabiendo que te esta mintiendo sigues dandole la oportunidad. Overwatch es MUY buen juego, pero desde el cambio al 2, el sistema de rankeds que es lo peor que he visto en un juego competitivo y la lossingqueue hace que la gente competitiva (que es normalmente la que mÃ¡s juega) no tenga muchas ganas de jugar, ya que ganar para bajar de rango es... En fin. 
Todas esas promesas del PVE, Ã¡rbol de habilidades y talentos es algo que para mi y muchÃ­sima gente era la principal razÃ³n por la que COMPRAR el PVE y lo quitan, pues no voy a pagar 15â‚¬ por 3 misiones que se olvidan al dÃ­a siguiente, lo siento mucho.

El juego, en si, es muy bueno, pero si no te importa tener que perder 4 partidas para ganar 1 por el MM, y no eres competitivo, entonces, te recomiendo el juego, ya que en cuento a bugs, optimizaciÃ³n y en general la calidad del juego,es buena, ahora, el gameplay es plano y en ocasiones repetitivo.

Imagine taking negative reviews on Overwatch 2 seriously. They hated Blizzard to begin with. It wasn't like they'd say anything nice. Anyway, onto the review.

It's a good game. Better than Team Fortress 2 honestly. People are complaining about microitransactions when they're literally just cosmetics lol. Meanwhile yal lplay games with the same functionality.
I remember playing overwatch back in beta in 2007, when they only had 9 heroes. It was super fun and still brings joy to me to this day, oh wait, thats teamfortress 2
